name: Hunnic Girl In Divided Roman Empire
name_original: Hunnic Girl In Divided Roman Empire
description:
──In The Devided Roman Empire, Hunnic Girl's Revenge Has Begin!


◆Story
In The Late 4th Century's Europe, Hunnila The Hun Girl Travel The Divided Eastern and Western Roman Empire For Her Revenge.

From The Roman's New City, Constantinopolis to Capital In Swamp, Ravenna,
Hunnila Experience Sadness, Vetrayal and Rage.

The Secret Organization That Devide The Roman Empire as East and West, "Sons of Hittite"
Make Influence To The Empire In The Darkness.

In The Divided Roman Empire Filled With Gap and Hatress to Immigrants,
Hunnila Is Just a Girl.

When She Get Defeated In Battle, and Her Journey End,
No One Will Rememver The Girl.

Can Hunnila Make Her Revenge?

And After the Revenge, What Remain to Her?

◆How to Play


Battle System

As The Situation of Enemy is Far or Close, Use "Change Weapon" and "Skill" Well,
And Attack The Enemies With Sword and Bow.

　Sword - Can Reduce Enemy's Attack Damage, But Cannot Attack When Enemy is Far.
　Bow - Can Attack Enemy In Close and Far, But Weak For Enemy's Attack

Max Level is 4, Reinforce the Strength or Get New Skills to Improve on Weapon's Weak When Clear The Chapter

Event Play

x Key - Hide Text Window
ctrl Key - Skip Text

◆Characters




◆Features



◇Hand-drawn 1086 CG Art (500 Story CG + 586 H-Scene CG) and 24 Standing CG.

◇Up to 150,000 words of Scenario Text.

◇More Than 200 Events, CG Animation Style 30 H-Scene.

◇Can ON/OFF Female Character's Voice When See H-Scene, And Bad Ending Describe.

◇Can Select Battle Difficulty.

◇13 Bad Ending and 1 True Happy Ending.
